metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12921 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In GraphicsMagick before 1.3.32, the text filename component allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a crafted image because of TranslateTextEx for SVG.

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
